H3.text: where will the cricket world cup 2019 be held. England and Wales

A4.text: It was the fifth time that England had hosted the World Cup, and the third time matches had been played in Wales.

A5.text: The tournament was hosted between 30 May and 14 July across 10 venues in England and a single venue in Wales.
